headline: NVR (NYSE:NVR) Posts Q4 Sales In Line With Estimates
summary: Homebuilder NVR (NYSE:NVR) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2024, with sales up 14.3% year on year to $2.78 billion. Its GAAP profit of $139.93 per share was 6.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: NVR: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $126.41 per share. The homebuilder posted revenue of $2.78 billion in the period, also beating Street forecasts. Three analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $2.69 billion.

raw.headline: NVR: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $126.41 per share. The homebuilder posted revenue of $2.78 billion in the period, also beating Street forecasts. Three analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $2.69 billion.

headline: NVR, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS
summary: NVR, Inc. (NYSE: NVR), one of the nation's largest homebuilding and mortgage banking companies, announced net income for its fourth quarter ended December 31, 2024 of $457.4 million, or $139.93 per diluted share. For the fourth quarter ended December 31, 2024, net income increased 12% and diluted earnings per share increased 15%, when compared to 2023 fourth quarter net income of $410.1 million, or $121.56 per diluted share. Consolidated revenues for the fourth quarter of 2024 totaled $2.85 bill
